Meal Plan: Whole grain cereal with low-fat milk or yogurt, topped with fresh fruit
Whole grain toast with scrambled eggs or avocado
Oatmeal topped with nuts, seeds, and a drizzle of honey or maple syrup
Grilled chicken or tofu salad with mixed greens, vegetables, and a light vinaigrette dressing
Whole grain wrap filled with turkey, lettuce, tomato, and avocado
Lentil soup with whole grain bread and a side of mixed fruit
Baked salmon or tofu with quinoa or brown rice and steamed vegetables
Spaghetti with lean turkey meatballs and a side salad
Stir-fried vegetables with tofu or shrimp and brown rice
Greek yogurt with honey and berries
Popcorn sprinkled with nutritional yeast or cinnamon
